text: West Dummerston is an unincorporated village in the town of Dummerston, Windham County, Vermont, United States. The community is located along Vermont Route 30 and the West River north-northwest of Brattleboro. West Dummerston has a post office with ZIP code 05357. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Windham County, Vermont Category:Unincorporated communities in Vermont
title: West Dummerston, Vermont
